body.name: Fruit of the Loom Men's Recycled Waffle Thermal Underwear Crew Top (1 and 2 Packs)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Fruit of the Loom Store

features: Soft mini waffle fabric thermal long sleeve crew neck t-shirt made from U.S. sourced cotton and recycled polyester
Wicks away moisture to keep you comfortable
Retains heat to keep you warm
body.description: Whether you’re looking for foundational warmth, lightweight performance, or both, this Fruit of the Loom Premium Men’s Thermal Crew-neck Top certainly has you covered. Made from U.S. sourced cotton and recycled polyester, this men’s base layer has a bulk-free fitted style and is built for protection, performance, and utmost comfort when you’re active outdoors in cold to moderately cold conditions. The natural breathability of cotton offers moisture-wicking to keep you dry, and the natural stretch offers flexible comfort that does not restrict your movements. The fabric’s waffle weaves create small air pockets that hold heat next to the body, and the rib cuffs at the wrists ensure heat stays trapped as much as possible. Additional features like a tag-free neck label and flat seams prevent chafing and enhances overall comfort. This Fruit of the Loom Premium Men’s Thermal Crew-neck Top is a must-have essential for your winter wardrobe.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,016 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #1 in Men's Thermal Underwear Tops

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product specs 52% Cotton, 48% Recycled Polyester Small Black Machine Wash Fruit of the Loom Men's Recycled Waffle Thermal Underwear Crew Top This Fruit of the Loom Men's Thermal Crew Top is ideal for cold conditions. It offers warmth, protection, and comfort. Crafted from U.S. cotton and recycled polyester, it features moisture-wicking properties, flexible stretch, and heat-trapping waffle weaves. With rib cuffs, a tag-free neck label, and flat seams, it ensures maximum comfort. Upgrade your winter wardrobe with this essential.

Soft waffle faric The super soft fabric feels great next to the skin, and the waffle pattern creates heat pockets to keep you warm all day long. Fitted construction Fitted construction provides a snug yet comfortable fit, which helps retain heat more efficiently and reduces bulk – making it perfect for layering. Long sleeves with cuffs Long sleeves provide the added warmth you need, and the rib-knit cuffs help minimize ride-up and trap heat in. Flat seams help reduce chafing so you can move with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son, it is very snug and warm. But the sleeves are really tight for people with large muscles. The sleeves are cut for tiny arms. It was a struggle for him to fit the sleeves and we bought an extra large. The length of the sleeves are great, just tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and non bulky
reviews.reviewText: I usually run warm, but our cold weather has changed that. I have found this shirt to be perfect for warmth and comfort, with non of the bulkiness. Washes nicely, fits under jackets with ease, comfortable against the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They run small and black and grey feel different
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered these in the recommended size (L), they were too small. I don't like tight clothes. So, I got the XL and these are the right size for me. But, apparently, what Fruit of the Loom or Amazon thinks is the right size is tight. The other thing I found is that the black and the grey feel different. The black feels kind of clingy. They shouldn't feel very different, because the fabric is the same and the appearance of the weave is the same. But the grey seems a tiny bit thicker and feels softer and more comfortable to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fit is perfect. Very soft and warm. They look good on also. Very happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a product that actually fits
reviews.reviewText: These are very soft and comfy and have that perfect form fit. I had originally purchased a Large, but they were tight and I couldn't even grab the material on my arms without pinching myself. I decided to try the XL and they fit perfectly! I am 6'2", 200lbs. and they are a really great fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not long enough
reviews.reviewText: I am a big guy (5'9" & 325lbs) - I go between 3x & 4x in my wardrobe. I ordered the 4xl top and 3xl bottoms - the bottoms were a little long which is fine - I might could have done 2x there. However, I got a 4xl top - Sleeves are long enough, shoulders is fine, but it does not completely cover all my belly. If they offered a 4xlt I would get that. After trying on, I put my 4xl carhartt long sleeve shirt back on and it is plenty long enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, comfortable fit
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift - they definitely like the shirt tail length of the shirt and the overall fit. It wasn't snug, it is very comfortable, even after a few washings. Great shirt as a base layer too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bait and switch?!?!
reviews.reviewText: The one on the right is the first thermal I received which was perfect in every way, shape and form... Then I order/exchange 1,2,3 more and keep getting the one on the left.the right one = Color is actually black, material is comfortable and light weight, stretchy a bit and fits perfect. It is just like alll the thermals I owned throughout life and I use to live in the snow and went through a lot of thermals, I even wash many times already and still perfect.the left one = color is super light and grayish but not even black, material is ruff and itchy feeling, thick, not stretchy at all and even Extra large size before I wash it is too tight for my arms. The length is shorter. Just all around not as nice...first time I order it came perfect, black,65%Poly,35%cotton,made in Honduras. Fits perfect.all others I ordered so far are NOT black, different material,52% cotton, 48% poly, too tight, made in El Salvador. completely different. Doesn't even fit and hard to pull onto my arms yet body is way bigger. I am average size so arms should not be that tight. I know thermals are meant to be tight but not this tight yet body of thermal is way baggier than arms.I would understand getting the one I don't like if it was the first one I received I would have just returned and moves on to other brands. But since the first one came and is so nice I wanted more of the "same" they should make it clear that they could come from different places and made with different material and different blend and different size and different color... at least set the expectations correctly from the start. I am just surprised as I didn't expect this from a brand like Fruit of the Loom. All my Amazon brand and Thermal John and Dickies and Hanes brand ones I bought (as I ordered one of each to see what ones I like the best) and for different reasons I like the other brands and ordered more and always get same exact item. Actually always for years when ordering from Lucky brand or any brand name I always get the same item. So not sure why only Fruit of the Loom is sending different kinds of the same thermal first and second letting something this bad of quality be in use as one of the kinds of one of their items. love the first one I received but now wish I never received the good one as now I want more. If I only received the bad one first at least I wold t be going through all this to try to get the one I like."first time I order it came perfect, black,65%Poly,35%cotton,made in Honduras. Fits perfect."****PLEASE SEND ME THE ONE MADE IN HONDURAS... I will buy a lot of them while I can if I can actually get the nice one sent to me :( otherwise I will have to keep searching for another thermal that is just like the first one from another brand. So far amazon's brand is second in the running and the best overall. It is just a little thicker so harder to wear under t-shirts if desired. But otherwsise amazon brand thermal closest to real original style thermals from throughout my life. Thanks you Honduras for making such a nice thermal and I hope I can get a few more just like the first one I received.I will change the review to all five star if I can get more of the good ones like the first shirt I ordered (also I ordered these within days of each other so not like the style has changed or something, I just think the ones made in El Salvador are a lot cheaper made and horrible material. If you are listening Fruit of the Loom... Please don't sell a product of this low quality. Stick with Honduras as the ones they make are perfect. 🤷🏻‍♂️
EXCELENTE PRODUCTO Y CALIDAD AMUY BUEN PRECIO

I live in a high rise condo that at times you can really feel the dampness in winter. i like these waffle shirts for their warmth. One quirk, the black shirt is tighter fitting than the gray shirt. I have found out that there is a Henley version of these shirts which I have just ordered. Sometimes the neck is a little uncomfortable.
A good quality clothing underlay that does its job of keeping you warm. The long sleeves are much appreciated.
Fit was good but would have been perfect if there was a 4xl long little short
